title: SD Revisited: Side Effects of Free Speech (with Natasha Korgaonkar)
description:
In the wake of this momentous election, we revisit an episode from the archives where we got into the nitty gritty of the 1st Amendment. My friend Natasha Korgaonkar, former lawyer with the NAACP Legal Defense Fund, gets on the mic to clear up choice, freedom, and the difference in consequences when folks are exercising their rights vs. folks just runnin their mouths! 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
